user_query: I am a football coach and I need predictions for the upcoming matches in the next 48 hours. Can you provide me with the predictions for the classic market? Additionally, I would like to know the head-to-head stats and previous encounters between the home and away teams.

TaskList.description: Fetch upcoming football matches for the next 48 hours.
Get predictions for the classic market for each upcoming match.
Retrieve head-to-head statistics between the home and away teams for each upcoming match.
Gather data on previous encounters between the home and away teams for each upcoming match.
